title: GPP#9 - Ghost Partnership Proposal
body:
Proposal Summary 

The proposal is for a partnership with lucxs to develop a front-end in React to our gMinter MVP version. lucxs has +5 years of experience in React development and he is also a solidity developer. 

● Motivation 
Create gMinter front-end and keep luanzeira focused on Smart Contracts.

● Details of the deal: 
Timeframe: 2-4 weeks to complete 
Work hours: Not measured in hours
Price: 750 DAI + 30.000 GHO
Single Payment: 750 DAI + 15.000 GHO when the page with the full gMint journey is delivered (until mint confirmation).
Delivery: Complete gMinter frontend of the MVP project
Bonus: None
Vesting: No 
Requirement: Need voting (DAI payment) and +10k GHO reward
Budget Origin: Angel Round > MVP

●Relevant Information 

GFDao Litepaper - Ghost Partner Requirements: https://docs.ghost.finance/#499eb724e5654273a4550a3bb3b294ca
choices: YES, I do APPROVE this proposal
author: 0x56d78862dcC0bf47C87bdE39BAD9a5A4e9085D00
